content: Defunct constituency in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "West Coast Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(December 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **West Coast Constituency** was a constituency that existed from 1980 to 1988 in Singapore. It was formed in 1980 by carving out from [Bukit Timah Constituency](/wiki/Bukit_Timah_Constituency). In 1988, it was merged into [Pasir Panjang Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Pasir_Panjang_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament **Election** **Member of Parliament****Party****1980**[Wan Soon Bee](/wiki/Wan_Soon_Bee)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1984** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election): West Coast PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Wan Soon Bee](/wiki/Wan_Soon_Bee)** **15,185** **84.43** [SJP](/wiki/Singapore_Justice_Party)M Ramasamy2,80115.57Majority12,38468.86[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)18,949[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)17,98694.92[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat)[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election): West Coast PartyCandidateVotes%±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Wan Soon Bee** **19,745** **75.72** **8.71** [SJP](/wiki/Singapore_Justice_Party)M Ramasamy6,33124.288.71[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)1341451.4417.42[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)28,00847.8[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)26,07693.11.82[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))8.71 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
